summary: PWA Icon Management feature fully verified. All backend APIs working correctly. Frontend UI shows PWA icon section in STAS Mirror Branding tab with correct Arabic text and 'جديد' (New) badge.

PWA_icon_section_visibility.description: Navigate to /stas-mirror as STAS user, click 'الهوية' tab - PWA icon section visible with 'أيقونة التطبيق (PWA)' text and 'جديد' badge

GET_pwa_icon_192.description: GET /api/company-settings/pwa-icon/192 returns valid PNG image (status 200, content-type: image/png)

GET_manifest_json.description: GET /api/company-settings/manifest.json returns valid manifest with dynamic icons, RTL support (lang=ar, dir=rtl)

critical_code_review_comments: Backend /api/company-settings/pwa-icon/{size} correctly resizes images using PIL and serves as PNG
Backend /api/company-settings/manifest.json dynamically generates icons with cache-busting version parameter
Frontend PWA icon section shows fallback to company logo when no custom icon is uploaded ('من الشعار' label visible)
Frontend index.html correctly links to dynamic manifest and icon endpoints
context_for_next_testing_agent: PWA Icon Management feature verified: 1) Branding tab (data-testid='tab-company-settings') shows PWA icon section with 'أيقونة التطبيق (PWA)' title and 'جديد' badge. 2) Upload functionality available. 3) Currently using company logo as fallback (shown with 'من الشعار' label). 4) All API endpoints working: /api/company-settings/pwa-icon/{192,512,180}, /api/company-settings/manifest.json returns dynamic icons with RTL support.
